Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserComponent
      • User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Acceptor, Observer, Subject

    public class User
extends UserComponent
implements Subject, Observer, Acceptor
    Represents a User. User is a UserComponent User also implements Subject, Observer, and Acceptor.
